Publishing Site Creation

You are here

    iAssure International Technologies / ECM Solutions / Publishing Site Creation
  •   0

Description

Problem Statement
Client was looking for a branding exercise that would make their internet presence more relevant to the changes. They were looking for platform where corporate communication teams can quickly publish content on the site without any help from technical department or technology partners/vendors. Also, the content should be scrutinized by approvers from the marketing and corporate communication teams before it is published on live site to the global audience.

 

Solution
The solution provided is publishing site on SharePoint 2013 that would have a site dedicated for the content authors. The content (i.e. News, pages, documents, images, etc.) could be easily created with minimum or no help from technology partners. The solution provided included two publishing sites, one site where the authors would make the content changes and submit it. On submission the workflow is executed where the Approvers approve or reject the changes. Once the content is approved, the content is published. The SharePoint content deployment job is executed to carry the published changes to another SharePoint site which is extended to internet. The internet site makes the content available to the global audience.

 

Benefits

  • Portal became more efficient
  • More awareness about company with all results, reports and news published real time
  • Site was capable to send newsletter to the readers who want to get informed of the news and publications on the portal

 

 

 

  • Date Published: 07/10/2015
  • Categories: ECM Solutions
  • Skills: SharePoint 2013, jQuery, Microsoft SQL Server
